participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and family-oriented, Alex is passionate about music and enjoys baking, finding joy in the process and the memories attached to her drum set.
participant_1.background: I am not comfortable sharing my weight. I am close with my family and always have been. My drum set is my most valued material possession because it is a reminder of my time in Japan and the adventures I had there. My parents pay my rent. I like to make fresh pies.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: As a dedicated soccer mom, Jessica balances her love for her family with her creative pursuits in art, finding ways to express her experiences through her work.
participant_2.background: I am not the fittest person, but I run to stay healthy for my baby. I am a soccer mom. I love art. I have a laptop that allows me to easily share my travel pictures and stories with others. My adoptive parents were amazed when I played twinkle twinkle little star with my armpit.

content.text: Great! My sister just gave birth to a beautiful baby girl! I am going to be a great auntie. What about you?

That is wonderful news! Congratulations to your sister and her partner. I am doing well. I am working on my drum set today. My family is very important to me, and my drum set is a reminder of my time in Japan. I love to make fresh pies.
That's so cool! I am not the fittest person, but I run to stay healthy for my baby. I love art, and I have a laptop that allows me to easily share my travel pictures and stories with others.
What type of art do you like to do? I enjoy making fresh pies. What is your favorite type of pie to make?
I like to do all kinds of art, but I am particularly drawn to watercolors. I love making apple pies. What kind of pies do you like to make?
I love making cherry pies. They are my favorite. I also like to make apple pies, but not as much as cherry pies.
Cherry pies are delicious! I love the sweet and tart combination. I also like making peach pies
